蘯字的基本解释

蘯
dàng
古同“荡”。

蘯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dàng］
［《廣韻》徒朗切，上蕩，定。］
“偒1”的今字。“荡1”的繁体字。亦作“蘯1”。“1”的被通假字。
(1)摇动；摆动。
(2)引申为动摇。
(3)震荡；激荡。
(4)引申为萌动。
(5)流，排泄。
(6)洗涤。
(7)荡涤；清除。
(8)毁坏；破坏。
(9)恣纵；放荡不羁。
(10)诱惑；迷惑。
(11)平坦。
(12)引申为平等。
(13)广大。
(14)引申为渺茫。
(15)宽恕。
(16)闲逛。
(17)冲撞；冲杀；触碰。
(18)浅水湖；沼泽。
(19)心悸。一种心动加速的症状。
(20)同“簜”。大竹。
(21)姓。春秋宋有荡泽。见《左传·成公十五年》。
[②]［tàng］
［《廣韻》他浪切，去宕，透。］
“荡2”的繁体字。亦作“蘯2”。通“趟3”。
量词。
[③]［tāng］
［《集韻》他郎切，平唐，透。］
“荡3”的繁体字。亦作“蘯3”。
古水名。即今之汤水，在河南省

蘯字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蘯； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1070第24
【直音】音義與蕩同。

蘯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蘯字的起名意思

暂无。

Awkward
Basic explanation of words
Awkward
dàng
Gu Tong "dang".
Awkward
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dàng］
["Guangyun" Tu Langqie, Dangdang, Ding. ]
The present word for "偒1". Traditional Chinese characters for "Dang 1". Also known as "蘯1". "1" was passed falsely.
(1) Shake; swing.
(2) The extension is vacillation.
(3) Shock; shock.
(4) The extension is sprouting.
(5) Flow, excretion.
(6) Washing.
(7) Washing; clearing.
(8) Destruction; destruction.
(9) Indulgence; bohemian.
(10) Temptation; Confusion.
(11) Flat.
(12) The extension is equality.
(13) The vastness.
(14) By extension, it is vague.
(15) Forgiveness.
(16) Hang out.
(17) Crash; Crash; Touch.
(18) Shallow lake; swamp.
(19) Palpitations. A symptom of rapid heartbeat.
(20) Same as "簜". Otake.
(21) Last name. The Spring, Autumn and Song Dynasty have dangze. See "Zuo Zhuan·Fifteen Years of Cheng Gong".
[②]［tàng］
["Guangyun" He cuts, goes down, and sees through. ]
"Dang 2" in traditional characters. Also known as "蘯2". Pass "trip 3".
quantifier.
[③]［tāng］
["Jiyun" he cut, flat Tang, through. ]
"Dang 3" in traditional characters. Also known as "蘯3".
Ancient water name. Now the soup, in Henan Province
Awkward
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蘯; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1070 Page 24
[Straight tone] The sound and meaning are the same as the swing.
